Resources

It's very easy to get lost in the middle of the PLS universe. Here you can find a number of resources that may be useful for PLS users and newbies.

Resources related to PLS:

  • the Software section contains a list of software both free and commercial about PLS and related methods.

  • the Data section contains a series of datasets for teaching, experimenting and testing purposes.

  • the Meetings symposia, conferences, workshops.
